entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
